00040 void PolyConstant :: init()
00041 {
00042     // this might be better as pNameList
00043     pValid_.push_back(aw::pNameValue);
00044     pTypeMap_[aw::pNameValue] = aw::gTypeNone;
00045 }

00062 // =============================================================================
00064 // This method must override the behavior of other Generators as it is not made of Generators
00065 std::string PolyConstant :: getParameterString(bool compact)
00066 {
00067     // just return list
00068     if (compact) {
00069         return aw::arrayDoubleToString(value_, polySize_);
00070     }
00071     else {
00072         std::string str;
00073         str += getName();
00074         str += "{";   
00075         // abbreviated version; just have number alone
00076         str += aw::arrayDoubleToString(value_, polySize_);    
00077         str += "}";
00078         return str;
00079     }
00080 }

00084 // =============================================================================
00085 // Set the parameter of this Generator
00086 // As a PolyConstant, this method must override Generator behavior to set
00087 // value_ directly
00088 // value_ is defined as private in PolyConstant.h
00089 void PolyConstant :: setParameter(const aw::ParameterName p, 
00090                                   std::vector<double>& v, 
00091                                   aw::ParameterContext pc)
00092 {
00093     // checks parameters defined on pValid
00094     if (!isValidParameter(p)) {
00095         throw std::invalid_argument("invalid parameter for this generator");
00096     }
00097     bool match(false);
00098     switch (p) {                       
00099         case aw::pNameValue:     
00100             if (isValidContext(p, pc)) {
00101             // note: this Generator does not use the pMap_ map
00102                 // transfer values to local vector
00103                 for (int i=0; i<v.size(); i++) {
00104                     value_[i] = v[i]; 
00105                 };
00106                 polySize_ = v.size(); // update size
00107             match = true;
00108             break;              
00109             }
00110     }
00111     if (!match) {
00112         throw std::invalid_argument("invalid parameter name or parameter context");
00113     }    
00114 }

00116 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00117 // String overload, calls vector overload
00118 void PolyConstant :: setParameter(const aw::ParameterName p, 
00119                                   std::string& vString, 
00120                                   aw::ParameterContext pc)
00121 {
00122     std::vector<double> vVector = aw::stringToVectorDouble(vString);
00123     // pass on vector to vector version
00124     setParameter(p, vVector, pc);
00125 }

00128 void PolyConstant :: setParameter(const aw::ParameterName p, 
00129                                   char* const vCharArray, 
00130                                   aw::ParameterContext pc)
00131 {
00132     std::vector<double> vVector = aw::stringToVectorDouble(vCharArray);
00133     // pass on vector to vector version
00134     setParameter(p, vVector, pc);
00135 }

00137 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00139 // must not call Generator version
00140 void PolyConstant :: setParameter(std::string& pString, 
00141                                   std::string& vString, 
00142                                   std::string& pcString)
00143 {
00144     // pass on vector to vector version
00145     setParameter(aw::stringToParameterName(pString), 
00146                  vString, 
00147                  aw::stringToParameterContext(pcString));
00148 }

00153 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00154 // called from Generator, overloaded for PolyConstant
00155 void PolyConstant :: readParameterString(std::string& parameterString) {
00156 
00157     std::string str(parameterString); // get a copy of this string
00158     //std::cout << "PolyConstant.readParameterString(): " << str << std::endl;
00159 
00160     // in some cases we will get just a number as parmeter string
00161     // if the are in the form value{3}
00162     bool pStrIsArgs = aw::canConvertFromStringToVectorDouble(str); 
00163 
00164     if (pStrIsArgs) {
00165         setParameter(aw::pNameValue, 
00166                      parameterString,
00167                      aw::pContextNameNone);
00168     }
00169     else {
00170         // read in parameters; there can be only one
00171         std::string name(""); 
00172         std::string arguments("");
00173         std::string context("");
00174         std::string working("");
00175     
00176         aw::getFirstParameterTrio(str, name, arguments, context, working);
00177         // names here are parameter names; as strings, these will be converted
00178         setParameter(aw::stringToParameterName(name), 
00179                      arguments, // leave as string; easer function matching
00180                      aw::pContextNameNone);
00181     }
00182     
00183 }

00187 // =============================================================================
00188 // return a pointer to a working array
00189 double* PolyConstant :: getPolyAtSample(aw::SampleTimeType)
00190 {
00191     // update values in working vector; the values may be changed
00192     // in later processing
00193 
00194     for (int i=0; i<polySize_; i++) {
00195         workingArray_[i] = value_[i]; 
00196     };
00197     // returning the pointer to the vector
00198     return workingArray_;
00199 }
